name: Kevin M.
review: Xbox will not turn on- used intermittently for last 8 months and now it won't work

name: Michelle
review: Probably the best purchase I could have made for my sons during this pandemic. Very nice console. Easy to operate. A must have!

name: Adam desrochers
review: i bought this xbox Feb 2020 it blacks out when it wants will just shut off disconnect from the internet when you know of a system not even lasting a year and its DISCONTINUED meaning there was an issue with this one an Amazon wont do nothing about it

name: Sean
review: Bought this Xbox a long time ago and it’s still working flawlessly. No complaints at all!

name: Kai
review: Xbox arrived in flawless condition and the drive was fresh. Came with 3 codes, 2 game codes and 1 DLC. Xbox lags occasionally, however it is the cheaper/less beefy version of the Xbox One Consoles.

name: Bridget N Conzemius
review: Mine is showing me a black screen worked for a month now I can’t even play I want a refund
